## WorkspaceSvg.hideChaff() method

Close tooltips, context menus, dropdown selections, etc.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onlyClosePopups | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether only popups should be closed. Defaults to false. |
